components.text:
Heylo, I am Nixii! I am a programmer and music composer based in California. I have an interest in many things, including astronomy, oceanography, linguistics, game development, art, and cryptography. All of my completed projects will be here, so be sure to check them out!
For most of my projects here, you are able to view the source code on GitHub! The link should be right on the projects page.
With my experience as a programmer, I have some alright experience with many languages and tools for development. Here is the list of just the ones I can remember off the top of my head!

- python
- rust
- javascript
- java
- c
- zsh
- lua
- and many more can be learned quickly!

- godot
- pretty much any ide (i can exit vim!)
- git
- github
- roblox
In addition to those, I am actively learning multiple other subjects! Most of these are just for fun, as they are stuff I find interesting.

- mandarin
- greek
- spanish
- aarch64 assembly
- os dev on a raspberry pi
